# Description

My current research interests involve public engagement in science and transdisciplinary research. I am also broadly interested in the field of metascience, particularly under a perspective of philosophy of science and science and technology studies.

```{r radarPlot, eval = TRUE}

member_name <- "Ana Barbosa Mendes"
special_skill <- c("citizen science", "responsible research and innovation")

OS_skills <- read_csv(here("static/OS_skills.csv")) %>%
  dplyr::filter(name %in% c("max", "min", member_name)) %>%
  dplyr::select(c("reproducible analysis", "open source software", "data sharing", all_of(special_skill), "preregistration", "open access", "data management"))

# custom radar plot
radarchart(OS_skills,
  axistype = 0, seg = 10,
  pcol = alpha("#002328", 0.8), pfcol = alpha("#00B969", 0.6), plwd = 4, centerzero = TRUE, # polygon
  cglcol = "#7e7e7e", axislabcol = "#002328", caxislabels = seq(0, 10, 2), cglwd = 0.8 # grid
)

```
